chunks.zh: 开工第一天，大家目前的感受，以及过年期间有什么值得分享的事情吗
chunks.en: First day back at work, what are everyone's feelings right now, and what interesting things happened during the Spring Festival that you'd like to share?

chunks.zh: 我的话，感觉明显今年催婚更急迫了...同学聚会聊天基本就两个话题，工作和感情
chunks.en: Personally, I feel like the pressure to get married is even more intense this year... Class reunions basically revolve around two topics: work and relationships.

chunks.zh: 上班第一天发呆中，想鼓起勇气提辞职
chunks.en: Spacing out on the first day of work, trying to summon the courage to resign.

chunks.zh: 前几天回杭州和女朋友都是第一次，第一次我居然软了😂
chunks.en: Went back to Hangzhou a few days ago and it was my first time with my girlfriend, and I actually went soft the first time 😂

chunks.zh: 搞钱的想法再次达到顶峰
chunks.en: The desire to make money has reached its peak again.

chunks.zh: 开工抢了 8.98 元的红包，领导要求站着拍了个无聊的视频
chunks.en: Got a red envelope for 8.98 yuan on the first day of work, and the boss made us stand and record a boring video.

chunks.zh: 相亲遇到了很主动的妹子，感觉有希望
chunks.en: Met a very proactive girl on a blind date, feeling hopeful.

chunks.zh: 父母明显变老了
chunks.en: My parents have clearly gotten older.

chunks.zh: 老婆怀孕了，已经 8 个月了，陪老婆+丈母娘+老丈人在工作定居点过春节给老婆从一加 ace3 换成了 vivo x100s ，老婆很开心，天天拍美美的照片，这钱花得值自己天天看剧看小说，看了大奉打更人+庆余年 1+庆余年 2 （进行中）长胖了对未来期待更多了。孩子马上要出生了，要当爸爸了
chunks.en: My wife is pregnant, already 8 months along. I spent the Spring Festival with my wife, mother-in-law, and father-in-law at our work-settled place. I upgraded my wife's OnePlus Ace 3 to a Vivo X100s. My wife is very happy and takes beautiful photos every day, this money was well spent. I've been watching dramas and reading novels every day, finished The Grand Lord Is a Black Job and Joy of Life 1, and am currently watching Joy of Life 2. I've gained weight and have more expectations for the future. The baby is about to be born, and I'm going to be a dad.

chunks.zh: 催婚催婚...
chunks.en: Marriage pressure, marriage pressure...

chunks.zh: 催婚
chunks.en: Marriage pressure

chunks.zh: 催婚+1
chunks.en: Marriage pressure +1

chunks.zh: 同学赚了几千万
chunks.en: A classmate made tens of millions.

chunks.zh: 县里有个做直播的赚到钱了，同学的同学不少离婚了，父母老了，还是看不开，总要攀比，无解。
chunks.en: Someone in the county who does live streaming has made money. Many of my classmates' classmates have gotten divorced. My parents are getting old and still can't let things go, always comparing themselves to others. There's no solution.

chunks.zh: 打算 2 月底裸辞 gap 几个月。
chunks.en: Planning to quit my job at the end of February and take a few months off.

chunks.zh: 遇到小仙女了，找时间写个帖子记录下吧
chunks.en: Met a fairy-like girl, will find time to write a post to record it.

chunks.zh: 今天路上竟然没想象中的塞车（甚至根本完全不塞车）
chunks.en: Surprisingly, there wasn't as much traffic as I expected on the road today (or even no traffic at all).

chunks.zh: 去年底提的新车大年初二喜提一血，昨天又二血，心痛……
chunks.en: Got a new car at the end of last year and it got its first scratch on the second day of Lunar New Year, and another one yesterday, heartbroken...…

chunks.zh: @xiaohupro  过来人劝你千万不要，能忍则忍。今年只会比去年差，有一份工作就挺不错了
chunks.en: @xiaohupro Someone who's been there advises you not to do it no matter what, endure it if you can. This year will only be worse than last year, having a job is pretty good.

chunks.zh: 催婚+1 97 年的 其实已经和女朋友分手了 但我没敢和家里说
chunks.en: Marriage pressure +1. I was born in '97 and have actually broken up with my girlfriend, but I haven't dared to tell my family.

chunks.zh: n1 过了
chunks.en: Passed the N1 (Japanese-Language Proficiency Test).

chunks.zh: 今年第一次有了不想离开家的感觉之前因为家庭原因每年回家都是折磨，都是想着赶快走。不知道是父母年纪大了还是自己长大了，初六早上走的时候有点不想走，还挺想念家里的。
chunks.en: For the first time this year, I didn't want to leave home. Before, going home every year was torture due to family reasons, and I always just wanted to leave as soon as possible. I don't know if it's because my parents are getting older or I'm growing up, but I didn't want to leave when I left on the morning of the sixth day of the Lunar New Year and missed home a bit.
